name: I'm Mortal
description:
I'm Mortal is a short visual novel following Roxy and her friends. Roxy is a 19 years freshman with the taste for partying. She has an older 24 years old brother, who is dating her best friend Jasmin. Their relationship is going through a bit of a rough patch since Marcus finished school and started working full time, so getting hem to party with the rest of the group, is no longer that easy. Roxy and Jasmin knew each other since kindergarten and have been inseparable ever since. In 3rd grade of elementary school, they got a new transfer, a girl named Emma, who grew up into a real party animal. The last one to join the crew was Roxy's boyfriend Justin. They meet at the start of the freshman year, and have been dating for about half a year, till the time of the story.

In this game you will be playing Roxy, and later on her brother Marcus, dealing with Roxy's death.
